content.content: BlockTower Credit - Monthly Report (12/21/2022 - 01/31/2023)  Preamble Title: BlockTower Credit Monthly Arranger Report Period: 12/21/2022 - 1/31/2023 Posted: 1/31/2023 Author: @BlockTower Tags: @Recognized-Delegates @Aes Ilks: RWA010-A, RWA011-A, RWA012-A, RWA013-A   References  BlockTower Credit (Arranger) Collateral Onboarding Application BlockTower Credit - Commercial and Legal Risk Assessment - Part I BlockTower Credit - Commercial and Legal Risk Assessment - Part II BlockTower Credit Legal Transaction Documents   Executive Summary BlockTower Credit is excited to publish the first monthly report on our Maker RWA Vaults (RWA010, RWA011, RWA012, RWA013). During this reporting period, we financed 12 Structured Credit assets within the Consumer and Marketplace Lending, Solar, and Small Business Lending sectors with commerical ratings above BBB- and totaling over $60M in value. Importantly, these investments demonstrate the viability and potential of leveraging Centrifuge’s Tinlake platform and Ankura as indenture trustee to onboard RWA collateral in a transparent and verifiable manner. Looking forward, we’re excited to continue bringing high quality RWAs for the Maker community and reporting on the results! Moving forward, we will deliver a similar report by the final day of each month.   Disclaimers PLEASE REFER TO OUR FULL DISCLAIMERS HERE
